name: Red Attack 2
description:
This is the sequel to my original game that nobody asked for!

I just wanted to make a sequel that was "better."

(The Web build is pretty buggy, so I recommend just downloading the exe file if you have windows)

----

You are back at dodging and defending yourself against these red, uh, "spikes."

There are 3 new gamemodes to choose from including:

Think fast

Downfall

Self defense

And it comes with the original, so yeah idk.

have fun, and don't be a loser

----

(NOTE: ALL MUSIC IN THIS GAME IS MADE BY KEVIN MACLEOD. I DO NOT OWN ANY OF THE MUSIC USED!)

(also dont get offended by the death messages they are jokes lol)
